thread.title: Wayne Public Library to host evening with Mary Higgins Clark - Books
thread.title_full: Wayne Public Library to host evening with Mary Higgins Clark - Books - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Wayne Public Library to host evening with Mary Higgins Clark - Books
text:
BOOKS: Mary Higgins Clark at Wayne Library 
The Wayne Public Library is hosting a meet-and-greet, book signing and wine tasting with best-selling author and Saddle River resident Mary Higgins Clark at 6:30 p.m. Nov. 20. 
Tickets for the 21-and-over event are $50 and can be purchased at waynepubliclibrary.org. Each attendee will get a signed copy of the legendary mystery writer's latest book, "All Dressed in White." 
The event is part of the library's fundraising programs. For more information: 973-694-4272, ext. 5401. 
â€” Kara Yorio
